Delighted to see how @austintexasgov is avoiding vendor & technology lock-in by exploring #JAMstack & #HeadlessCMS approaches to managing & publishing content. This thoughtful article by @MateoClarke nicely shares the thinking behind that. Looking forward to seeing the progress. https://t.co/64rTHGrxMC
